name: py-httpx

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-httpcore
dependencies.description:
The HTTP Core package provides a minimal low-level HTTP client, which
does one thing only. Sending HTTP requests.

dependencies.name: py-rfc3986
dependencies.description:
A Python implementation of RFC 3986 including validation and authority
parsing.

dependencies.name: py-sniffio
dependencies.description:
This is a tiny package whose only purpose is to let you detect which
async library your code is running under.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-charset-normalizer
dependencies.description:
The Real First Universal Charset Detector. Open, modern and actively
maintained alternative to Chardet.

dependencies.name: py-hstspreload
dependencies.description: Chromium HSTS Preload list as a Python package and updated daily

dependencies.name: py-h11
dependencies.description: A pure-Python, bring-your-own-I/O implementation of HTTP/1.1

dependencies.name: py-idna
dependencies.description: Internationalized Domain Names for Python (IDNA 2008 and UTS #46)

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependent_to.name: py-fastapi
dependent_to.description:
FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready
for production

dependent_to.name: py-gradio
dependent_to.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models

dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependent_to.name: py-sanic
dependent_to.description:
Sanic is a Flask-like Python 3.5+ web server that is written to go fast.
It is based on the work done by the amazing folks at magicstack

dependent_to.name: py-gradio-client
dependent_to.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models
